website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced radar detector with adequate range and performance.
pros: An easy-to-use device with a large LED, effective radar detection, and a low number of false alerts
cons: Occasional complaints about durability and customer support

customer_reviews.title: Modern cars render it useless
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying, I use to own a beltronics 995 from 2009/2014 it served me well, it saved me tons of time... Fast forward to 2018 and I decided to pick up the rx-65. it's identical to the 995 with a few updates.. modern cars have made this thing a nightmaee anytime I'm near a BMW with blind spot detection.. this thing bounces off the wall. It's not so much the fault of the design both the 995 and the rx65 are excellent units but without some kind of signal processing for both blind spot and radar guided cruise it's virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Super sensitivity detecting radar from a long distance giving plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this radar detector for about 1 1/2 years. Super sensitivity detecting radar from a long distance giving plenty of warning on the Interstate Hwy. Can program detector to ignore nuisance bans, for example, X-ban. I like the button on the 12v charger plug that mutes alarms, don't need to reach up to the detector to mute. Paid for itself many times over and again. NOTE: may not get a useful warning if yours is the only vehicle on the road and you get hit with instant-on radar (or laser) at short distance]
customer_reviews.author: skelley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detector!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was hard choosing a detector with so many out there but decided on this one. I've only had it for (3) weeks so far but it's worked perfectly and hasn't let me down yet! It alerts me when a cop is near and it doesn't falsely go off numerous times which is a total plus. for every I've never been disappointed. It's pretty much a plug N play! There's nothing you have to fool with or program although it does have 8 program selections you can mess with.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S., Las Vegas, NV

customer_reviews.title: Long distance detector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this detector several years ago for the first time and was sold on it right away! This detector will reach out and pick up any radar being used long before they can see you even over hills. You cant ever avoid the instant radar hits but if they use it on someone before u get to them it will pick it up. I love this detector so much ive bought 2 more for my son and wife. I highly recommend this one. Detectors that cost more or have more bells and whistles are just not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Too many false alarms
customer_reviews.text: Way too many false alarms. I used it on PART of a trip to Florida last week. It was constantly beeping. Maybe 98 time out of 100, there were no police around. With so many false alarms, it is worthless. Finally I unplugged it and will never plug it back in. I wish I had my money back. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: Corbett B. Coburn III

customer_reviews.title: ... plenty of radar detectors over the years and I love the Beltronics
customer_reviews.text: I have had plenty of radar detectors over the years and I love the Beltronics. The RX65 is my most trusted next to the STI. The STI however is a lot more money so I went with the RX65 this time. The unit arrived and I was excited to try it out. I plugged it in and right away it fired up. I went for a short drive and sure enough the unit went off with the KA band and about a half mile down the road there was the gun pointing right at oncoming traffic. I am very please with the range of this unit. Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Book

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: I was riding with detector since 2003 and this unit works well however it has an older platform and allows K-Band distraction from the traffic light and other vehicles with certain safety features. There is the option to disable K-Band however sheriffs and police in my area have a few older cars with dashboard mountain K speeding radars, therefore, I have to go thru some noise. On another hand, many traffic lights are controlled by KB so I know in advance if the light changes
customer_reviews.author: Rob Z

customer_reviews.title: Regret my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Drove by Numerous police cars and officers standing on the side of the road with radar guns pointing at the car and it did not go off. I even got a speeding ticket while using this. K band beeps very often, which does not help. I would love to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great custom radar detector, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This has very good distance compared to other radar detectors I've used, you can also turn off the uncommon radar bands that cops don't use anymore, which drastically minimizes false alerts, it has an Autoscan feauture which is also very helpful and it tells you exactly which band it's reading (ka band will almost always be a cop it seems like) and you will want to turn off X band. I’ve had this for 2 years now and it has saved me so many times and 100% worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Truncated version, but still a Beltronics product. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are much different from ten years ago, now that the market has changed. Not as heavy as the previous versions; thin plastic housing vs thick painted; etc, etc. Same features. If you know Beltronics, none of these changes will matter. It’s like comparing a car made of steel vs plastic and aluminum. Get one while they are available!
customer_reviews.author: EpiNupe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radar Detector
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a RX65, but wasn't willing to fork out over $400 for one. Now Amazon has them for a great price, I ordered two of them. It's the best RD I've ever owned, and I've owned quite a few over the years. This one does it all, even talks to you, and will detect and identify multiple bands at the same time. Has configurable display and you can configure which bands you don't want it to alert to. It also picks up a long long way, it was alerting to a POP radar over two miles away when the cop radared someone else. I recommend this RD.
customer_reviews.author: Tinman

customer_reviews.title: Saved me money already
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptic about purchasing a radar detector. After reading multiple reviews and looking at multiple detectors I settled on this one. This thing WORKS! It goes off in time to be able to cancel the cruise and slow down. I've had it save me at least 4 times already. It has paid for itself. I've recommended this to multiple friends and they are seeing the same results. If you drive a lot and have a lead foot this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Twall

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer because the first never let me down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same model about 11 years ago and it has worked perfectly until about 2 weeks ago when it quit working, I purchased the exact same model for two reasons. 1. I was very familiar with it's sounds/chirps/modes and it has worked great in the past for me and 2. the positive reviews on here and other sites mirror my sentiment of the product. I was worried about an updated version though, and this new one seems peppier and speedier than my model 11 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Realist

customer_reviews.title: Beltronics RX65 works great.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. No false alarms so far after several months. I wos not sure about getting after reading the reviews. My usage of the unit has proved very positive so far. The range is very good. At times the range has been over a mile... Love it! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne G.

customer_reviews.title: So far pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a few days ago and seems to work like a boss, once you figure how to put Ka into USA mode and turn off everything else it's great. Make sure to run it on highway mode to get maximum strength. I'll give it 5 stars once I use it for a little longer 4/11/17 10-13-18 this thing seriously works. Idk how many times its saved me from speeding on the highway. it actually catches the cop from a far distance plenty of time to slow down
customer_reviews.author: Alex gtz

customer_reviews.title: Works as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Item was received in perfect condition. Installed easily on the windshield, although I have ordered a beanbag mounting platform for easy out of sight removal when I park (if it ever arrives). So far getting a lot of "K" warnings but not enough to be annoying. Don't know yet if I want to turn "K" off. You never know. If anything goes wrong I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Very few false alarms
customer_reviews.text: I knew it would be good, I have had a Bel before. When it makes a noise, pay attention because false alarms are few and far between. My only complaint, is I wish they would put larger stiffer suction cups on these detectors. I live in Maine, and the cold weather often times releases the suction cups, but the larger ones fair better in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: TJH Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: No tickets, please
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector replaced my Cobra (I had for many years.). I like the sound quality as the voice calls out the different bands. It has helped thus far to avoid speeding tickets in my small hometown! The plus is that it picks up signals at quite a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Von Yingling

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this radar detector for all types of driving
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised for a prior Beltronics that was in need of replacing after 7 years of use. Highly recommend this radar detector for all types of driving.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Felten

customer_reviews.title: Great Radar Detector
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent but basic old school radar detector. No, it does not have laser jammers and gps, etc. However, it doesn't cost $1,500 either! For most events, this is all you need as long as you are not trying to push 100mph in 55mph zone. And you will save around $1,350!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tims

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Purchase unless you are ok with constant noise
customer_reviews.text: Radar detector works for cops..However it goes off every store pulling their security. So it constantly goes off & very nerve-racking. When you press mute it literally works for like five seconds and it’s back at it. I would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Mi’Mi’

customer_reviews.title: money saver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome detection range, love the voice, love the programmability, I use the City no X Band mode to eliminate those annoying alarm and traffic motion sensors, seems to perform as well as the top of the line Escort Passport, without the traffic camera warning feature. We have 2, and they have saved myself and my wife thousands of dollars due to the proliferation of speed traps, a especially in the corrupt little townships who use their police radar for revenue collection, not to promote safe driving.
customer_reviews.author: John Poole

customer_reviews.title: but my 10 year old Beltronics 935 which I was looking to retire does not false alerts anything like this much
customer_reviews.text: I'm having to return this item because it repeatedly false alerts on Laser and K bands. Not sure if its a problem with a faulty device or a design issue, but my 10 year old Beltronics 935 which I was looking to retire does not false alerts anything like this much.
customer_reviews.author: Lak

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased. It works well, the only time they'll really get ya is if they have a laser gun or if they don't have their radar on and then turn it on as you pass. I had my previous one for about 4 years, the audible alarm finally started malfunctioning (sometimes it worked, sometimes it didnt).
customer_reviews.author: Loraine White

customer_reviews.title: Beltronics RX-65 Red Radar Detector
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Beltronics RX-65 for several months. The RX-65 works well, but there is no guarantee that you will not get caught speeding if Instant-ON is used; however, it has saved me numerous times under other circumstances. Plenty of advance warning except for Instant-ON. I also own the Beltronics V-955 which works about as well as the RX-65. Both are good radar detectors for the money. Some false alarms on both. Generally SC HP and local police use a different K band than store front signals so there is a difference in my area. These detectors are much better than the Cobra that I also own.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jager

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I drive over 300 miles a day as a delivery driver mostly highway, this radar detector will sniff out a state trooper a mile away depending on the terrain, on a curve highway road it warned me about 3 quarter mile ahead, if a trooper was sitting on top of a highway bridge it detected close to 2 miles away. This thing saved​ me while the person in the lane left of me got pulled over for speeding. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: glk20

customer_reviews.title: Worthless honestly
customer_reviews.text: Drove by highway patrol with laser on “crickets” no alert from this thing. False alerts every time you drive through Stores and Hospital. Had cops behind me or in front an no alert
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Lover

customer_reviews.title: Long range detecting
customer_reviews.text: A great detector, can detect Police/ Highway patrol at least 1-2 miles ahead. Rare false alarms, will go off with traffic radar as expected. Will sometimes go off with certain autos, With Lane sensors but very tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: wildlife columbo

customer_reviews.title: Radar doesn’t detect anything
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with product, radar doesn’t detect anything. I called customer support and was told I had purchased an old model. So why would they be selling old models to start with
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: It will pay for itself in no time!
customer_reviews.text: This detector has saved me a dozen times paying for itself after the first alert! Worth the price of admission and added piece of mind!
customer_reviews.author: R. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: ... mention toooooooo many false alarms and the suction cups suck!
customer_reviews.text: too many false alarms oh yea did I mention toooooooo many false alarms and the suction cups suck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great radar detector!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Beltronics RX65, picks up radar with plenty of time to slow down with minimal false alarms and at this price is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: David A Castanon

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model that is far better. This thing picks up so many false signals you can't trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: After been using this radar for the past 3 months, it is time to review it. I travel and average of 200 miles a day through Florida area, West, East and South. I wasn't sure of this unit but I decided to give it a try for the price tag. OMG! This is the best radar I ever owned. The detection range on this unit is crazy and the build is solid and nice looking. It goes head to head with the Valentine and Escort units. It doesn't miss a cop on the interstate and highways. Saved me many and many times!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZeroFlow-FPV

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic. I had not owned a radar detector in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. I had not owned a radar detector in years and boy have they improved significantly or maybe it's just this Beltronics version. All of the speed traps appear to use Ka band so far, so you can select that to block out false alarms. I won't leave home for those long highway trips in Texas without it. Has already saved me 3 times in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This radar is very cheaply made, isn't solid like its predecessors. Plus the volume kept going up and down by itself.
customer_reviews.author: joe espi

customer_reviews.title: Great detector that will keep you out of trouble.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit and used it to drive round trip from Ontario, Canada to California- 5000 miles. It is an amazing unit. My problem was not braking fast enough when it alarms. It has great detection capabilities that fool you in thinking "Where is the cop?" He's there but you can't see him yet. Got nailed with laser radar gun from a motorbike cop in Missouri. Had enough warning to slow down and smile as I passed by. Yes, I agree with other postings, Beltronics offers no warranty support unless purchased through an approved retailer. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Slightly better than V6
customer_reviews.text: Operates as it should. Expected great distance for a warning. But it is a slight improvement over my Beltronic V6. So I'm somewhat happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeckel

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Saved me several times, and it doesn't hardly ever give a "false alarm". As good as any I've used, and a lot cheaper than any that are close in every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: tod080

customer_reviews.title: Nice detector, works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Good little detector for the price. Hard to see when it is sunny out. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good detector so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this detector because I was handing down a Bel 955 to my son, The Bel 955 was by far the best detector I ever owned. The new RX65 is a great replacement, consistently alerting me to police radar over two miles away. I live in southeast Georgia so the land here is pretty flat but I am confident using this detector. I am not a speeder but do like to know when the police are around. We all know how police choose to pull people over based o bias and I am glad to know when they are around I am driving right for conditions.
customer_reviews.author: William Robert

customer_reviews.title: The product is great
customer_reviews.text: There is no thing I don’t like about it. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: mabure atak

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a radar detector before but decided to buy one for a long vacation road trip. Bought the Bel RX65 based on reviews here and elsewhere. Used it regularly for about 3 weeks and 4800 miles. Depending on how you look at it, this either saved me several speeding tickets or many extra hours of driving (if I had gone the speed limit). Did not take long to get used to and gave plenty of early warning on the interstates and flat,straight state highways in TX. Knowing limitations of technology, I did not push as much on state highways in mountains. Obviously can't compare to other models but a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: BigJohn

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I just use the autoscan. I do get some false alarms but not too many to be of any concern. Great range. Saved me the cost of this several times over so far in just a year. Probably the best cost per value ratio of any radar detector. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I had been using one for years with no problem. Then is was stolen. This is an exact replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Butt

customer_reviews.title: Previous generation, great response times
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit knowing that it was the previous generation Beltronics Professional Series Radar Detector. The lower price tag and solid reviews were the two biggest selling points for me. I researched various Detectors for a few weeks and ended up picking this one. Having owned a Beltronics V955 previously this is a definite step up. The faster response times and more sensitive receiver result in alerts noticeably sooner than the V955, especially when coming around corners. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBob

customer_reviews.title: Good price works greay
customer_reviews.text: Great radar detector although it’s cord could use a little more strengthening due to the excessive pull from the coil cord
customer_reviews.author: Maintenance Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these items as replacements for two that malfunctioned after seven years. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DBH

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these same units years ago for one car and it still works just fine. So, when I bought a new car I bought a one for that car as well. These things are a life saver. Everyone assumes they are illegal to have, Not So !!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve_

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This radar works awesome. It saved me many tickets on the highway and in town. I owned two of them in the past 5 years and had both stolen from my car. I wish they would build some kind of security code if unplugged or tracking device for theft deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Tineli

customer_reviews.title: Customer service blows!
customer_reviews.text: Laser constantly going off in sun then died completely. Wait until u have a problem. Brutal customer service. Called all day today and customer service says queue is full. We can’t even let u get a call back. Called the sales department and they said 800 number only recourse. Just bought a uniden r3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: saves you $$
customer_reviews.text: works as expected and has some nice features. I really like the mute button located on the power cord. Great distance, 360 Deg works well.
customer_reviews.author: Hydrosteve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent detector
customer_reviews.text: So far I only got one ticket with this on, and it was because I ignored the beeping because otherwise I wouldn't have gotten a ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second one!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, used it over the weekend and it surely saved me a few times. The crazy part about it is how well it works when they are behind you coming up or on an on ramp. You're pretty much protected from all sides, and the price is great. I just bought one for my Father as well, I have the Blue one and the Red version.
customer_reviews.author: localbrew

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself already!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my butt 2x already and just got it! Not many false alarms at all compared to my cobra. Paid for itself saved my butt from 2 possible tickets!!! Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Beltronics puts out a very well designed high tech detector which is very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill O.

customer_reviews.title: but it will lock on those stupid speed moniters
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't missed one yet, but it will lock on those stupid speed moniters, however it helps when there's a cop sitting on those....just sayin'...
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: I love love love love love this item it works it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love love this item it works it's save me from about 25 tickets I drive a Camaro that's red so it was a must-have that I have a radar detector totally worth everything and every penny definitely had some false alarms at the beginning but I followed the instructions by turning X and K Radars off and I haven't had a misread ever since
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product but could use better suction cups
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but after two years in the Florida sun, the suction cups don’t work well any more, falls every few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This saved me so much money it paid for itself. I never leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A tad over sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: Similar to my old model 955 but without the laser detection, which is not missed as it went off more with the sun than with the cops. It also responds more to door openers etc than the older (more expensive) model.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Radar Detector
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for frequent travel across Texas - it works great and gives ample warning for all types of radar/laser signal. The thing I love the most is that it rarely gives false readings so when it goes off expect to see the 'source'. Best detector I have ever owned and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Whorton

customer_reviews.title: Protect yourself.
customer_reviews.text: I had another radar detector for many years, and was unsure if this would meet my needs. I'm still becoming acquainted with the settings, but am pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.author: uncletamale

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It was an extra for my 2nd car. No issues. Girlfriend says the lights are to bright at night even on dim. But I leave on bright always and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use very functional
customer_reviews.text: Awesome detector can see cops shooting radar over a mile away! Stream lined and easy to use beats my cobra junker hands down.!!!
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: ... with this little R2 unit is it seems to like laser's from other cars not sure what it's picking ...
customer_reviews.text: only issue I have with this little R2 unit is it seems to like laser's from other cars not sure what it's picking up goes off when close to newer cars mite be picking up proximity censers maybe or high dollar laser confusers. It pays for it's self, the imperial forces can't hide.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua ybarra

customer_reviews.title: No more false annoying beeping.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is 2nd one we own. One in each car.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: and its far better than this
customer_reviews.text: Dont know if mine is faulty of what??? Already had an existing Profesional Series 100, and its far better than this. For the entire time we have had it, its never made a correct alarm, despite passing numerous cops, etc!!! Even tested it alongside the "100" one, and it proved faulty....
customer_reviews.author: BST

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after getting caught in a speed trap...the product detects Ka and LIDAR nicely without false alarms. If the machine alarms, especially Ka band and LASER, there is a reason! I bought this detector after reading reviews of other brands and the reviewers were saying they like their Beltronic better, so I cut to the chase and got the one that works with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Me--over here

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kinda get a lot of false alarms but it has saved me on multiple occasions
customer_reviews.author: Seandoutlick

customer_reviews.title: The unit is awesome for detection but the old units had the LED ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit is awesome for detection but the old units had the LED screen under a hood. This screen is exposed and when the sun is over the windshield at the right angles the reflection off of the face of the unit is blinding.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Unit performs very nicely
customer_reviews.text: The unit is compact, performs well and easy to use. In certain areas all detectors give false/positives, but better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Nikiper

customer_reviews.title: RX65 Radar Detector Terrific Value!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these exact models for about 8 years and purchased another one, due to the terrific quality of the first one. Very satisfied with the updated version, as well as the incredibly fast shipping and tracking from this vendor. Super satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby H

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best radar defector I've ever owned. I have one on all our cars and I recommended it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: gotmilk

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! This has saved me thousands of dollars! The unit gives so much advanced warning. Many times when the cops use the Laser, they don't remember to turn off the Ka band. So it's a no brainer. I drive very fast....have not gotten a speeding ticket since buying this! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: 1blood

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Works great...I've been needing one of these for a while !
customer_reviews.author: Mad again

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this detector for several years. This is the best radar detector for the money. It has saved me many times. It will detect radar miles down the road. I like the quick disconnect so when I leave my truck in the parking lot during the hot summer months I can place it under my seat.
customer_reviews.author: T. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: but enjoy the
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well. I am not a speeder, but enjoy the 'heads-up'
customer_reviews.author: DHuntr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of many radar detectors I've owned through the years and probably the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this when traveling. Does everything it says it should do.. I will be buying one for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Stay ahead of curve
customer_reviews.text: This unit is pretty accurate and has already paid for itself many times over.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Bracamonte

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Works well. Delivery was less than 3 days, which was amazing and I even got close to $10 back because of import duty they over charged me on. I wasn’t aware of this, they informed me about it. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked .....
customer_reviews.text: I loved this radar detector, for as long as it worked, which was 2 months. Plugged it in yesterday and it appears the connection cord is bad, not real sure. Everything else plugged into that connection works fine. Decent range, was pretty good, poor craftsmanship to have it die 2 months later. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: kwinders

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP Suction Cups!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't go off at every little thing like most radars, but it won't stay on my 07 Jeep Wrangler window either! For an expensive radar, you think they could have splurged on some decent suction cups. They do at least provide a 2nd set. It picked up a cop a long way off the other day, giving me plenty of time to slow down!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - Replaced by Beltronics Pro300...Everything is the same except the name!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same as the Pro300 which replaced it. A "Premium" radar detector at a very good price, offering lots of configuration including the ability to turn off unneeded bands to minimize annoyance notifications. Most of the time I get an alarm minutes before there is any visual contact. I am very satisfied with this detector, which replaced an older, budget detector.
customer_reviews.author: epell

product_meta.title: Beltronics RX65-Red Professional Series Radar Detector
product_meta.description:
Style:Red Display| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingBeltronics Pro RX65 radar/laser/safety detector provides ultra performance! This detector has it all. Digital technology provides ultra long-range detection. Features include text display, digital voice alerts, 7 selectable features, and custom travel case. It integrates with Laser Pro 905 for laser blocking.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Manufacturer's Description (October 30, 2008) 
If you are as serious about safety as you are about driving, then you need the Professional Series RX65, an advanced radar, laser and safety detector. The RX65 is a breeze to use, and boasts extreme sensitivity to all Radar and Laser bands with over 10 times the range of other detectors. 

If you are as serious about safety as you are about driving, then you need the Professional Series RX 65. Click to enlarge. 

Controlling alerts is right at your fingertips using the included SmartPlug power cord. Click to enlarge. 

Includes quick release windshield mount. 

Available with blue or red LED display. Click to enlarge. 

Superior Detection
The RX65 includes full X, K, SuperWide Ka, and Safety Warning System radar capability, front and rear laser detection, Beltronics' patented Mute and AutoMute, audible and visual band alerts, and all the performance you'd expect from Beltronics. Digital signal processing (DSP) gives you superior long-range ability, along with reduced false alarms. The AutoScan mode can virtually eliminate those false alarms, and provides both Highway and City settings. 

The RX65 also features Shadow Technology making it immune to VG-2 radar detector detection, meaning law enforcement can't detect your radar detector, keeping you one step ahead. 

Ease of Use
The rugged RX65 gives you control right at your fingertips using the included SmartPlug power cord. Patented Mute and AutoMute technology on the cord allows you to quickly silence alerts. Advanced programming lets you customize several features, and programmable bands let you set the device for your region, including International and North American settings. 

Installation is a snap: use the quick release mount to attach it to your vehicle's windshield, and remove it in a snap. Don't want to leave it in your vehicle? No problem, Beltronics includes a travel case to keep it secure while you're on foot. 

Ultra-Bright LED Display
Don't miss a visual alert with the RX65's 280-LED display. Exclusive threat display tracks and displays multiple radar signals, including signal strength. Tech Display provides actual numeric radar frequency for any radar signal. You can also view Safety Warning System (SWS) messages about upcoming hazards, construction and more. 

Red Light, Blue Light
The RX65 is available in both red and blue LED models, so you can choose the display that most suits you. 

How Safety Radar Works
Safety Warning System, or SWS, uses a modified K-band radar signal to alert users of Highway Construction or Maintenance, Highway Hazard Zone Advisories, Weather Related Hazards, Travel Information/Convenience, and Fast/Slow Moving Vehicles. The SWS safety radar system has 64 possible messages (60 currently allocated), all of which can be displayed on your RX65. 

What's in the Box
Beltronics RX65 RED Professional Series Radar, hard shell metal case, coiled SmartPlug, quick release windshield mount, manual
feature_bullets: Full X, K, SuperWide Ka, and Safety Warning System radar capability, digital "POP" radar alert, and Safety Warning System message display
Advanced AutoScan processing and digital signal processing increase range and virtually eliminate false alerts
Easy-to-use programming allows you to customize up to 7 options for your specific driving style
Immune to VG-2 radar detector detection, so law enforcement cannot detect its use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars931 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
